label: section:introduction
text: A development kit to interact with the Frequenz development platform.

label: section:supported platforms
text:
The following platforms are officially supported (test):

Python:
3.11 .. 3.13
Operating System:
Ubuntu Linux 20.04
Architectures:
amd64, arm64

label: section:quick start
text:
We assume you are on a system with Python available. If that is not the case,
please
download and install Python
first.

To install the SDK, you probably want to create a new virtual environment first.
For example, if you use a
sh
compatible shell, you can do this:

python3 -m venv .venv
. .venv/bin/activate

Then, just install using
pip
:

python3 -m pip install frequenz-sdk

label: section:documentation
text:
For more information, please visit the
documentation
website
.

label: section:contributing
text:
If you want to know how to build this project and contribute to it, please
check out the
Contributing Guide
.
